mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document_category (name, description, icon, color, sort_order, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{icon}, #{color}, #{sortOrder}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE document_category SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, icon = #{icon}, color = #{color}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, icon, color, sort_order, status, create_time, update_time FROM document_category WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
